title: Spiced Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['75g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '350g black treacle', '500g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '250ml milk', '675g plain chocolate chips', '150g raisins']
